title: Nenjil Nenjil Idho song lyrics - Engeyum kadhal song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Harish Ragavendra, Chinmayi
Song: Nenjil Nenjil
Movie: Engeyum Kadhal
Lyrics: Karky

[Nenjil Nenjil Idho idho
kadhal Kadhal priandhadho
Konjum kaatril mayangiye
Konjam meley parandhadho
Maalai vezhai velai kaatudho
En moolai vaanam juvaalai mootudho ] (2)

En nilavil en nilavil
oru minsaral thaan thoovudho
En kanavil En kanavil
unbinbath thugal inbangal pozhigayil

Nenjil Nenjil Idho idho
kadhal Kadhal priandhadho
Konjum kaatril mayangiye
Konjam meley parandhadho
Maalai vezhai velai kaatudho
En moolai vaanam juvaalai mootudho

Oru mounam parava
Siru kadhal poludhil
Vizhiyil vizhayum mozhiyil edhuvum kavidhayadi
Asayum imayil esaiyil edhuvum inimaiyadi

Ven Marbil padarum
Un paarvai vidavum
Idhyap pudharil sidharich sidhari valivadhu en
Oru udhirum thuzhiyil udhiram muludhum udhirvadhu en

urugadhey uyire
Vizhagadhey marale
Un kadhal verai kaanavendi
Vaanam thaandi unakul nuzhandhadho ..

Nenjil Nenjil Idho idho
kadhal Kadhal priandhadho ...

Pasiyodum idhalum
Pasierum viralum
Iradha pidhu irraya vizhayum neramidhu
Uyirin murayil myirin thooramadhu

oru vellai Thirayaiyaai
un ullam thirandhaai
Chiruga chiruga iravai thirudum tharigaye
Vidiyum varayil viralum idhalum thoorigayil

vidiyadhey irave
Mudiyadhey Kanave
Nee innum konjam nelam kori
kadhal kadhal thudika thudika

Nenjil Nenjil Idho idho
kadhal Kadhal priandhadho ...

En nilavil en nilavil
oru minsaral thaan thoovudho
En kanavil En kanavil
unbinbath thugal inbangal pozhigayil
